subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Despite playing a man short for much of the match, Chelsea drew Barcelona, 2-2, and held Lionel Messi without a goal, to advance to play Real Madrid or Bayern Munich.
snippet: Despite playing a man short for much of the match, Chelsea drew Barcelona, 2-2, and held Lionel Messi without a goal, to advance to play Real Madrid or Bayern Munich.
